synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blunt Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir, along with their guest Gara, delve into the complexities of breakups, sharing personal stories and insights on healing, self-discovery, and the importance of self-compassion. The conversation navigates the emotional landscape of relationships, offering listeners valuable perspectives on moving forward and embracing life's challenges.
quotes: You have to live your life for life's sake.
Your brain is a machine, but your consciousness is above it.
I had to learn how to exist because I feel I did it before.
You can either say, okay, the purpose of my life is X, Y, and Z, but you can poke holes in all of those things.
If you're not afraid of the worst-case scenario, it becomes fine.
You are the sky, not the storm.
Every day, you have to choose to be with that person.
If you can't do it perfectly, then don't do it at all.
It's okay that the pizza is lukewarm and floppy; it still satisfied my hunger.
Sometimes you just have to let the storm come and go.
